title: Create example eval suite and demo agent
description: Create sample evaluation suite YAML files and a demo agent for testing and documentation. These serve as both integration test fixtures and user onboarding examples. Include a mock agent that simulates tool calls for predictable test results.
acceptance_criteria: demo-suite.yaml contains 5+ test cases covering all scorer types
simple-suite.yaml contains 2-3 minimal cases for quick testing
demo_agent.py implements AgentProtocol with real tool simulation
mock_agent.py returns predictable outputs for deterministic testing
Mock agent supports configurable pass/fail scenarios
README.md documents how to run examples
Examples work with both local and API execution modes
implementation_notes: demo-suite.yaml cases: factual_search, no_tool_needed, multi_step, reasoning_chain, grounding_check
mock_agent should accept 'scenario' parameter to control behavior
Tag cases by scorer type for filtering
Add timeout_seconds variations to test timeout handling
Document YAML schema in README with annotated examples
